item.description:
The Original Steppers of Boston have been invited to participate in pre-gala celebrations and after party sponsored by Ethnic Online in collaboration with the Urban League 2011 Conference hosted in Boston July 25 - 30

This will be a significant opportunity to showcase "The Original Steppers of Boston"

 

Attire is Steppers' Sharp - help represent your city

 

THIS INVITATION IS FOR ACTIVE PARTICPATING MEMBERS OF THE ORIGINAL STEPPERS OF BOSTON ONLY  

  GUEST MAY ATTEND $25 IN ADVANCE $35 AT THE DOOR SEE BANNER FOR DETAIL

 MEET AT THE SEAPORT HOTEL AT  8:45   TO RECEIVE YOUR PASSES

THIS IS THE ONLY TIME PASSES WILL BE GIVEN OUT

YOUR NAME MUST BE ON THE RSVP LIST IN ORDER TO RECEIVE A PASS

 

 

 

 

Many of us will wake up early to head to NYC for the Steppin' Events but please RSVP for this event

Big Thanks to April Holley for the connection to this event

Click on banner to preview magazine

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: STEPPIN GALA
